description: Returns events related to instances, security groups, snapshots, and DB parameter groups for the past 14 days. You can obtain events specific to a particular DB instance, security group, snapshot, or parameter group by providing the name as a parameter. By default, the events of the past hour are returned.

parameters.name: SourceIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the event source for which events are returned. If not specified, then all sources are included in the response. Constraints: If SourceIdentifier is provided, SourceType must also be provided. If the source type is DBInstance, a DBInstanceIdentifier must be provided. If the source type is DBSecurityGroup, a DBSecurityGroupName must be provided. If the source type is DBParameterGroup, a DBParameterGroupName must be provided. If the source type is DBSnapshot, a DBSnapshotIdentifier must be provided. Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time interval to retrieve events for, specified in ISO 8601 format. Example: 2009-07-08T18:00Z.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time interval for which to retrieve events, specified in ISO 8601 format. Example: 2009-07-08T18:00Z.

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: The number of minutes to retrieve events for. Default: 60

parameters.name: EventCategories
parameters.description: A list of event categories that trigger notifications for an event notification subscription. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: This parameter is not currently supported. (dict) --- A named set of filter values, used to return a more specific list of results. You can use a filter to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs. Wildcards are not supported in filters. The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive. One or more filter values. Filter values are case sensitive. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: One or more filter values. Filter values are case sensitive.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token (marker) is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: Events
nested_items.description: Detailed information about one or more events.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: Provides the identifier for the source of the event.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: Specifies the source type for this event.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Provides the text of this event.

nested_items.name: EventCategories
nested_items.description: Specifies the category for the event.

nested_items.name: Date
nested_items.description: Specifies the date and time of the event.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the event.
